H0.text: what did the ancient romans speak. Ancient Greek

H1.text: what did the ancient romans speak. Etruscan

H2.text: what did the ancient romans speak. Oscan

H3.text: what did the ancient romans speak. Latin Language

A4.text: Romans adapted the Etruscan alphabet to form the Latin alphabet but also borrowed some Etruscan words into their language

A5.text: Latin also included vocabulary borrowed from Oscan, another Italic language

A6.text: Latin was the language of the Romans from the earliest known period.

A7.text: Latin was the official language of the Roman army until the mid-6th century, and remained the most common language for military use even in the Eastern empire until the 630s.
